description: A colleague of Sanshiro`s father, Dr. Warmer helped develop PlaWrestling technology. After telling Sanshiro of his father`s desire to use PlaWrestling to help the disabled, Sanshiro gathers data from Juohmaru`s battles and send them to him. Dr. Warmer analyses this data and eventually comes up with a novel technology that relies on brain wave induction to restore a person`s mobility.
name: Doctor Warmer
